qas.question: What two words is 'gastropub' a portanteau of?
In what year was the term gastropub invented?
Along with David Eyre, who took over the Eagle pub?
In what city is the Eagle pub located?
In what area of London is the Eagle pub located?

context: A gastropub concentrates on quality food. The name is a portmanteau of <a0_0>pub and gastronomy<a0_0/> and was coined in <a1_0>1991<a1_0/> when David Eyre and <a2_0>Mike Belben<a2_0/> took over The Eagle pub in <a4_0>Clerkenwell<a4_0/>, <a3_0>London<a3_0/>. The concept of a restaurant in a pub reinvigorated both pub culture and British dining, though has occasionally attracted criticism for potentially removing the character of traditional pubs.
